name: Harold's Ghastly Adventure
description:
Harold's Ghastly Adventure is a 2D platformer in a spooky mansion follow Harold, a friendly ghost who wants to restore the mansion with the power of a harp inside. Find the strings in various sections of the mansion to fix the harp and bring the mansion back to its former glory.

Credits:

Griffin Thenell - Gameplay Programmer, Level Design and Background Artist

Zachary Morello - Character Design and Enemy AI Programmer
